root.name: Elebits: The Adventures of Kai and Zero
root.description: OverviewElebits: The Adventures of Kai and Zero is a sequel to 2006's Elebits. Developed by Konami and published by Konami, the game is due to release for the Nintendo DS on August 12, 2008. The game stars Kai and the Zero Elebit found in the first game.
